Title: Complex multiplication tori class number and inferior boundary of special point galois orbits Nombre de classes des tores de multiplication complexe et bornes inférieures pour les orbites galoisiennes de points spéciaux
Abstract: © Société Mathématique de France.In this paper we give lower bounds for class numbers of CM algebraic tori. We deduce lower bounds for the size of the Galois orbits of special points in Shimura varieties (unconditionally and under the Generalised Riemann Hypothesis).
